formatted_address: 80 Marine Parade Rd, #02-12 Parkway Parade, Singapore 449269
name: Ichiban Boshi (Parkway Parade)

reviews.text:
I really enjoyed our dinner here tonight. Food wise, they are having some parents day set and it's value for money.
We were impressed by the serving staff, Yenny. Very attentive, and personal service. When my son doesn't drink green tea, she offered to swap it to ice water. Totally unexpected and we appreciate her initiative.
Yenny truly made tonight's dinner a very pleasant experience.

Great restaurant! Uncompromising quality and flavor. My friend and I came in for dinner and were pleased with the large portions, variety of dishes, convenience of ordering via QR code and speed of order readiness. Note the specials on set dinners for S$29.90 and special deals on certain types of bank cards. There is a children's menu and lots of delicious ice cream. Many thanks to the restaurant staff for such a wonderful dinner. Recommended!

Dinner service, you enter the queue by scanning a QR code. Though there was a sign saying waiting time is 15-30mins, I was seated in 5.
Food is nice, had a curry set plus some fried tofu. The chicken curry was delicious, being the main of the set, maybe the size was a bit smaller than expected, but by the time I finished I was full full. Recommended, wouldn't mind going back.

Had dinner with parents many times here.
Dad likes the food especially sashimiâ€¦
Mentaiko was nice
Place was not too crowded that time.
Fast service

This restaurant serves excellent executive set lunch dishes in the menu. Compliments to the kitchen chefs. The food presentation catches one's eye. The sushi served are fresh.The  food ingredients used are of good grade n the food portions are big. The service staffs are attentive n positive. Keep up the standards as more will come to this place with family n friends.
